name: Koramangala
description: Centrally located delivery zone in Bangalore, popular with students and working professionals.

name: Viman Nagar
description: Pune's student hub near Symbiosis, ideal for small grocery deliveries with no freezer storage.

name: South Delhi - Hauz Khas
description: Popular with university students and PG residents, perfect for ready-to-eat and budget-friendly groceries.

name: Salt Lake Sector V
description: Tech park zone in Kolkata, good for deliveries to IT professionals and hostels.

name: Gachibowli
description: Large student and working population; well-suited for smart grocery planning and low-waste food kits.

name: Velachery
description: A dense residential part of Chennai with demand for non-frozen, shelf-stable food options.

name: Navrangpura
description: Ahmedabad's student heartland with tight budgets and minimalist kitchens. Ideal for core target users.
